title.rendered: Piklist v0.10 is now available on WordPress.org

content.rendered:
Piklist v0.10 is a BIG update for Piklist with tons of enhancements, PHP 7.2 support, and is available on WordPress.org.

You can view the full changelog here >

Piklist documentation has been updated to reflect the changes in v0.10, including updated Tutorials.

You can stay up to date with Piklist development at github.com/piklist/piklist.
